Item ID235

Unicorn horn dust is a Herblore ingredient obtained by using a unicorn horn with a pestle and mortar or as a drop from cave bugs and cave crawlers. It can be used with a marrentill potion (unf) to make antipoison or with an irit potion (unf) to make superantipoison. It is also one of the ingredients required to turn super restores into Sanfew serums.

[[File:Unicorn horn dust detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Unicorn horn dust''' is a [[Herblore]] ingredient obtained by using a [[unicorn horn]] with a [[pestle and mortar]] or as a drop from [[cave bugs]] and [[cave crawlers]]. It can be used with a [[marrentill potion (unf)]] to make [[antipoison]] or with an [[irit potion (unf)]] to make [[superantipoison]]. It is also one of the ingredients required to turn [[super restore]]s into [[Sanfew serum]]s.
